Title: Dev Tools UI Fix
Description:
Aims to make Dev Tools bareable to use because we can't live with a decade old debug tool.

[h2]NEW KEYBINDS[/h2]
[list]
[*]Hold Left Shift + Drag: Move Panels without needing to hover over the move panel button
[*]Hold Left Ctrl + Click: Minimize Panels without needing to hover over the minimize button
[/list]

[h2]QOL CHANGES[/h2]
[list]
[*]Fixes panels overlapping with each other, causing accidental button presses
[*]Properly removes visuals when dragging them to the trash bin.
[/list]
